Appetizers.name: Seared Scallops
Appetizers.description: Pan-seared sea scallops with cauliflower purée, crispy pancetta, and micro herbs

Appetizers.name: Beef Carpaccio
Appetizers.description: Thinly sliced prime beef tenderloin with arugula, capers, shaved parmesan, and truffle oil

Appetizers.name: Wild Mushroom Bruschetta
Appetizers.description: Toasted artisan bread topped with sautéed wild mushrooms, ricotta, and fresh herbs

Appetizers.name: Tuna Tartare
Appetizers.description: Fresh ahi tuna with avocado, cucumber, sesame seeds, and wasabi aioli

Soups & Salads.name: Lobster Bisque
Soups & Salads.description: Creamy lobster soup with brandy, crème fraîche, and fresh herbs

Soups & Salads.name: French Onion Soup
Soups & Salads.description: Caramelized onion soup with beef broth, crusty bread, and melted Gruyère cheese

Soups & Salads.name: Roasted Beet Salad
Soups & Salads.description: Roasted heirloom beets with goat cheese, candied walnuts, and balsamic reduction

Soups & Salads.name: Caesar Salad
Soups & Salads.description: Crisp romaine lettuce with house-made Caesar dressing, garlic croutons, and shaved parmesan

Main Courses.name: Herb-Crusted Rack of Lamb
Main Courses.description: New Zealand lamb with Dijon mustard and herb crust, served with roasted fingerling potatoes and seasonal vegetables

Main Courses.name: Pan-Seared Salmon
Main Courses.description: Wild-caught salmon with lemon beurre blanc, asparagus, and wild rice pilaf

Main Courses.name: Filet Mignon
Main Courses.description: 8 oz. grass-fed beef tenderloin with truffle mashed potatoes, grilled asparagus, and red wine reduction

Main Courses.name: Wild Mushroom Risotto
Main Courses.description: Creamy arborio rice with assorted wild mushrooms, parmesan, white wine, and fresh herbs

Main Courses.name: Duck Breast
Main Courses.description: Maple-glazed duck breast with cherry sauce, braised red cabbage, and sweet potato purée

Main Courses.name: Seafood Linguine
Main Courses.description: Fresh pasta with shrimp, scallops, mussels, and calamari in a white wine and garlic sauce

Desserts.description: Warm chocolate cake with a molten center, served with vanilla bean ice cream and raspberry coulis

Desserts.description: Classic vanilla bean custard with caramelized sugar crust

Desserts.name: Apple Tart Tatin
Desserts.description: Upside-down caramelized apple tart with puff pastry, served with cinnamon ice cream

Desserts.description: Selection of artisanal cheeses with fruits, nuts, honey, and crusty bread
